item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 29, 2024 at 3:35 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Send someone you appreciate an official 'Continue and Persist' Letter (376 points | 57 comments)
2. The UX of Lego Interface Panels (2020) (256 points | 25 comments)
3. Hetzner raises prices while significantly lowering bandwidth (US) (286 points | 218 comments)
4. The success and failure of Ninja (2020) (131 points | 28 comments)
5. Microbenchmarks Are Experiments (4 points | discuss)
6. Car tires shed a quarter of all microplastics in the environment (94 points | 78 comments)
7. A pretty visualisation of the European power grid (2022) (205 points | 101 comments)
8. Tk9.0: CGo-free, cross platform GUI toolkit for Go (152 points | 49 comments)
9. Rapid colonization of a space-returned Ryugu sample by terrestrial microorganism (57 points | 22 comments)
10. In the Rockets' Red Glare: The past and future of hot-rodding in America (39 points | 30 comments)
11. AI and the Last Mile 2: Subsidiarity (34 points | 5 comments)
12. The Thinker Who Believed in Doing (2018) (21 points | discuss)
13. Bootkitty: Analyzing the first UEFI bootkit for Linux (108 points | 44 comments)
14. The Denver OWASP Chapter is proud to present SnowFROC '25 (12 points | discuss)
15. Engineers Do Not Get to Make Startup Mistakes When They Build Ledgers (61 points | 59 comments)
16. A new start after 60: I became a 'hummingbird' for people with dementia (86 points | 9 comments)
17. Aftershock II (9 points | 1 comment)
18. You can use C-Reduce for any language (461 points | 102 comments)
19. Canada Competition Bureau sues Google for anti-competitive conduct in online ads (21 points | 4 comments)
20. Show HN: Indentation-based syntax for Clojure (4 points | discuss)
21. QwQ: Alibaba's O1-like reasoning LLM (299 points | 220 comments)
22. London's 850-year-old food markets to close (256 points | 205 comments)
23. Malware can turn off webcam LED and record video, demonstrated on ThinkPad X230 (974 points | 499 comments)
24. Show HN: Myphotos.site – Make a gallery website from Google Photos (148 points | 70 comments)
25. Spotify has shut down several API endpoints (162 points | 123 comments)
26. A washing machine for human beings, from 1970 (130 points | 172 comments)
27. MIT Aluminum Bicycle Project 1974 (2016) (176 points | 134 comments)
28. Bananas: Cross-Platform screen sharing made simple (184 points | 51 comments)
29. In Praise of Print: Reading Is Essential in an Era of Epistemological Collapse (307 points | 270 comments)
30. Template Mixins (15 points | discuss)
